articles.title: DPRK Workers' Party Greets Brazilian PT
articles.content:
DPRK Workers' Party Greets Brazilian PT
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greetings to the 4th congress of the Brazilian Workers' Party on Thursday.
					 The message expressed belief that the congress would mark an important occasion in the efforts of the BWP to further strengthen itself and achieve the socio-political stability of the country and the independent development of its national economy.
					
					 Convinced that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would grow stronger in the future in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the message sincerely wished the congress great success in its work.

articles.title: An Kun Song Appointed DPRK Ambassador to Mexico
articles.content:
An Kun Song Appointed DPRK Ambassador to Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- An Kun Song was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Mexico, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Weather Observation during Forced March
articles.content:
Weather Observation during Forced March
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- According to data on weather observation in the period of the drive for a new great surge recently available from the Hydro-Meteorological Service, General Secretary Kim Jong Il made an endless forced march of high intensity for field guidance to every nook and corner of the country despite such unfavorable weather as boiling heat, biting cold, rainy wind and snowstorm.
					 Last year he visited at least 200 units despite very unfavorable weather conditions.
					
					 When he visited the Wonsan Youth Power Station and then Mt. Ryongak in January last year it was very cold and chilly wind over 10 meters per second howled. He covered a long tourist course, walking up icy and steep stairs.
					
					 He visited the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex and other large-scale industrial bases and industrial establishments and other units in Manpho, Hoeryong and Wonsan cities despite snowy wind in February. The weather registered 20 degrees below zero when he gave field guidance to the Musan Mining Complex. 
					
					 The temperature dropped as low as 2-5 degrees below zero in the northern mountainous areas in spring of May, causing frost damage. He, however, continued his field guidance to Huichon, Komdok and Yonsa areas despite such extremely abnormal weather.
					
					 He provided field guidance to the Pyongyang Textile Mill, Kim Jong Suk Naval University, the Songdowon Youth Open-Air Theatre, the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex and the February 8 Jiktong Youth Coal Mine in midsummer last year when it was the hottest since the decades' meteorological observation.
					
					 He gave field guidance to the Kujang Fish Farm, changing his handkerchiefs wet with sweat several times due to sweltering weather. He visited a public service unit in the capital city, his casual dress wet with sweat as the maximum temperature in daytime registered 33 degrees centigrade.
					
					 He visited the Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County, the Kumjingang Kuchang Youth Power Station, the construction site of the gasification process at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and units of the Korean People's Army in November when the temperature at noon was the lowest in 40 years.
					
					 He called on the people in Jagang Province and the workers of the Songjin Steel Complex and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex despite strong wind in the northern areas in December. 
					
					 He provided field guidance to a total of more than 30 units in the first 40 days of this year when biting cold persisted.
					
					 When he visited again the construction site of the Huichon Power Station the temperature there registered 30 degrees below zero and there was strong wind 15 metres per second, the severest cold in 65 years.
					
					 He made an endless forced march to the Jaeryong Mine, the construction site of Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 2, roads in North Phyongan Province, the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex and the Rakwon Machine Complex and other major units of the national economy. 
					
					 Thanks to the on-going dynamic march he is leading, deeming it as his pleasure to make all sorts of painstaking efforts to serve the Korean people, their ideals to lead a most bountiful and highly civilized life are being translated into brilliant realities one by one.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Realizes President's Wish
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Realizes President's Wish
						
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- In recent years many rural communities of Korea including the Migok, Tongbong and Unhung co-op farms have taken on a new look to suit the socialist features of a thriving nation.
					 The wonderful reality is a precious result of Kim Jong Il's leadership for realizing President Kim Il Sung's lifetime wish to see the Korean people live in tile-roofed houses, eating rice with meat soup and wearing silk clothes.
					
					 The President made the Korean peasants owners of lands for the first time in the history of the country through the agrarian reform in the 20th century while Kim Jong Il has provided solid foundations for the prosperity of the country through a large-scale land rezoning in the 21st century.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's wise guidance many fish, chicken, pig and goat farms have appeared throughout the country and a large number of rural communities have raised double or triple crops a year and introduced methane gas supply system for cooking and electric heating system in the era of Songun.
					
					 Nature-driven waterways have been constructed one after another and fresh successes registered in improving seed selection and potato and bean farming.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has unfolded a grand plan to bring about a radical turn in the people's living standard by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year.
					
					 He has continued to give field guidance to the agricultural sector for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Now the agricultural working people are exerting every effort to have a rich harvest this year and support Kim Jong Il's plan for the building of a thriving nation with increased grain production.

articles.title: Jagang Province Takes Lead in Building Strong Economy
articles.content:
Jagang Province Takes Lead in Building Strong Economy 
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Jagang Province is taking the lead in the effort for turning the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into an economic power.
					 Many factories in the province have introduced CNC technology in their production processes by themselves.
					
					 In particular, the Kanggye Knitted Goods Factory and the Kanggye Wine Factory have updated their production processes on a high level and provided their workers with good conditions for work and life.
					
					 The people in the province had suffered more difficulties during the "Arduous March," forced march, compared with those in other provinces.
					
					But they have launched the effort for converting their towns and villages into good places to live in with a firm belief that when they trust in and follow only General Secretary Kim Jong Il they would be well-off soon or later.
					
					 They have also succeeded in double cropping a year in spite of such unfavorable circumstances as highlands and low temperature.

articles.title: Dynamic Movement for National Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic Movement for National Reunification Called for
						
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Regional Committee under the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on Feb. 12, calling for conducting the dynamic movement of national reunification. 
					 Since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration that indicates a new way ahead of national reunification, many successes have been achieved in the movement of reunification for national reconciliation and unity, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 Contacts and cooperation between the organizations of different strata in the south and the north of Korea have been checked by the anti-reunification forces of south Korea and pro-reunification patriots are suppressed as reunification activities for implementing the declaration have been branded as "illegal," though.
					
					The fellow countrymen have been faced with the task to meet all challenges of anti-reunification forces, put an end to the history of national division caused by outsiders and realize national reunification at an early date under the banner of the south-north joint declaration through national unity. 
					
					The organisation will actively contribute to holding a grand festival for reunification in hearty response to the proposal of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration for the successful holding of the joint events of the nation marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					  The statement expressed the resolution to help such ardent desire for reunification prevail in the community of Koreans in Japan as seen in June 10 years ago and push ahead with colorful events and campaigns for national reunification.

articles.title: Russian Figures Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Russian Figures Visits DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- S. Z. Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, O. V. Oleinik, president of the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" and officials of the federation paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Feb. 12 and 13 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid floral baskets before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and made bows.
					
					 S. Z. Umalatova praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest leader and the sun of mankind whom all people look up to.
					
					 She said that thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK has become a nuclear weapons state and the satellite-launching state that no power dares provoke it.
					
					 The Party for Peace and Unity of Russia will fully support the Korean people in their just cause of reunifying the country and building a thriving socialist nation in the future, too, she noted.
					
					 O. V. Oleinik said that Kim Jong Il is the most outstanding statesman of the 21st century and a resolute defender of justice and peace in the present era.

articles.title: Mexican Party Leader Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Mexican Party Leader Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, asked So Jae Myong, DPRK ambassador to Mexico, to convey greetings of best wishes from himself and members of the leadership of the party to General Secretary  Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday, when meeting the DPRK ambassador who paid a farewell call on him on Feb. 10.
					 The general secretary reaffirmed the support of the party for the Workers' Party of Korea in its struggle for socialist principle and the independence against imperialism and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater success in building a thriving nation and expressed the will to steadily boost the friendly relations between the two parties. -0-

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Officials Should Become Genuine Servants Dedicating Themselves to the People" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries on Feb. 9.
					 The work, published on October 28, Juche 92 (2003), deals with the need for the officials to become genuine servants for the people who are called as "our officials" by the people and the tasks to do so.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated in Nepal, Bangladesh and S. Africa
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated in Nepal, Bangladesh and S. Africa
Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Nepal, Bangladesh and South Africa on Feb. 5 and 8 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were works of Kim Jong Il, books and photos on the Korean people's struggle.
					
					 Present there were personages and people from all walks of life of the relevant countries.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal and other speakers referred to the fact that the Korean people have gained signal achievements in the struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country while repulsing all sorts of imperialists' challenges under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, saying that all this is a good example for the people aspiring after independence.
					
					 The advisor to the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of Songun Policy said in his speech that it is the greatest fortune and honor for the Korean people to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Il who has creditably carried to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and that Kim Jong Il has pursued a unique Songun politics to frustrate the imperialist allied forces' moves against the DPRK and firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country. 
					
					 The chairperson of the Mahlambandlophy, Pretoria City, Branch of the African National Congress of South Africa addressed the film show.
					
					  He said that Kim Jong Il has made an energetic long journey of patriotic devotion only for the happiness of the people, adding that it is thanks to his wise guidance that the Korean people have wrought world-startling miracles in the building of an economic power.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo artistico de Unidad 963
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de grupo artistico de Unidad 963
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad 963 del EPC.
					Los ejecutantes pusieron ese dia en la escena el trio femenino "Osa Mayor es la estrella de anoranza", la poesia en dialogo "Nos encontremos otra vez en Huichon", las canciones en serie "Mi patria que defiendo", "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo" y "Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta", la poesia y coro "Defenderemos a muerte la Direccion de la Revolucion" y otras piezas de diversas formas. 
					
					A traves de este espectaculo, los ejecutantes demostraron bien el invencible poderio del EPC crecido como ejercito potente sin rivales bajo el regazo del gran Insigne Comandante y la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del ejercito popular de defender a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu. 
					
					Ademas, manifestaron sin reservas el mismo entusiasmo  y el mismo impetu con que llamaban a los militares a la lucha y las proezas realizando la combativa propaganda y agitacion en las trincheras, los campos de ejercicio y los lugares de construccion. De esta manera comprobaron firmemente la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion de nuestro partido sobre la propaganda artistica al estilo de la Guerrilla Antijaponesa y mostraron claramente el poderio de los artistas militares quienes inculcan a los militares el ardiente amor al partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo y cumplen satisfactoriamente su sagrada mision de trompetero de la epoca del Songun. 
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio a las aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y los espectadores y felicito el exito de funcion. 
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica hayan ofrecido esta funcion magnifica y especifica con las obras que reflejan vividamente el noble mundo ideo-espiritual del EPC, el Dirigente les dio agradecimiento evaluando altamente tal exito.
					
					En la educacion ideologica sobre los militares es muy importante la propaganda artistica de gran influencia, dijo el Dirigente e indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan para dinamizar las actividades de propaganda artistica.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: CC del PTC felicita el IV Congreso del PTB
articles.content:
CC del PTC felicita el IV Congreso del PTB
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al IV Congreso del Partido de los Trabajadores de Brasil (PTB).
					El mensaje expresa la conviccion de que el presente conclave servira de un importante motivo en la lucha del PTB por fortalecer aun mas el partido y lograr la estabilidad socio-politica del pais y el desarrollo independiente de la economia nacional.
					
					Exterioriza la confianza de que tambien en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas conforme al ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y desea sinceramente grandes exitos en la labor del Congreso.

articles.title: Nombrado An Kun Song como nuevo embajador coreano en Mexico
articles.content:
Nombrado An Kun Song como nuevo embajador coreano en Mexico
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, An Kun Song fue designado como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en Estados Unidos Mexicanos.

articles.title: PSPM desarrollara relaciones de amistad con el PTC
articles.content:
PSPM desarrollara relaciones de amistad con el PTC 
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ATCC) -- El pasado dia 10, el embajador coreano en Mexico, So Jae Myong, hizo una visita de despedida al secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Socialista del Pueblo de Mexico, Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez.
					En la ocasion el secretario general rogo al diplomatico coreano que le transmita al Dirigente        Kim Jong Il el saludo de si mismo y de los miembros de la Direccion de su partido que le tributan con motivo de su cumpleanos. 
					
					Reafirmo el apoyo y la solidaridad de su partido con la lucha del PTC por mantener los principios socialistas y lograr la causa de la independencia antiimperialista y la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais. 
					
					Deseo al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y expreso la voluntad de seguir desarrollando las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos.

articles.title: Personalidades rusas visitan la embajada coreana
articles.content:
Personalidades rusas visitan la embajada coreana 
						
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la presidenta del Partido por la Paz y la Unidad de Rusia, S. Z. Umalatova, el presidente de la Federacion Internacional de las Entidades de Caridad de Rusia "Mundo de Buena Voluntad", O. V. Oleinik, y otros funcionarios de esta entidad visitaron los dias 12 y 13 la Embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su pais.
					Los visitantes colocaron cestos de flores al pie de los retratos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente estando juntos de pie y les rindieron tributo. 
					
					S. Z. Umalatova alabo que el estimado camarada Kim Jong Il es el Sol de la humanidad y el gran Dirigente a quien venera todo el mundo.
					
					Gracias a la direccion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, Corea se ha convertido en el poseedor de armas nucleares y lanzador de satelite artificial, a que ningun pais poderoso se atreve a atacar, puntualizo. 
					
					En adelante tambien el Partido por la Paz y la Unidad de Rusia apoyara activamente la justa causa del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion de la patria y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista, concluyo.
					
					O. V. Oleinik, a su vez, elogio al Dirigente      Kim Jong Il como activista de Estado mas distinguido del siglo 21 y firme defensor de la justicia y paz de la epoca actual.
